commit message: Final commit with Catmull-Rom splines --> switching to B-splines.
Alpha blending added plus bezier splines taken into use.
A few new constants introduces plus colors changed.
Ornament plant classes bundled into OrnamentPlants class.
Visibility check added to spline rendering.
Spline visibility check moved inside rendering method.
Plant alpha value moved to constants.
Spline cut number reduced to 8 plus some minor changes.
Place holder for flower rendering added.
Application package renamed to ..flowers and classes accordingly.
Inner class names changed plus minor improvement in branch placement.
Added unregistering from preference changes to onDestroy method.
Many of the color preference layout values moved under styles.
Preferences implemented, default color schemes created etc etc..
String definitions moved to strings.xml resource.
Minor speed improvements and spline drawing fixed.
Out of screen spline clipping fixed.

Proguear setting added to project properties plus version code and name
increased.
Spline control points introduces as an array instead.

Spline control points introduced as an array instead plus some cosmetic
changes.
Preference titles changed for flower colors.
Version code and name increased for next release.

Flower texture creation moved back to onSurfaceChanged to avoid crash on
situations where device does not support shader compiler.
Flower texture generation made with Bitmap, Canvas and Pain instead.
Comments added plus a trivial optimization added.

Added more robust error handling for devices which do not support GLSL
shader compiler.

Flower texture rotation changed to matrix rotation. Plus rotation set to
random value.
Copyright owner names changed to US-ASCII only.

File proguard.cfg removed and internal default proguard configuration
file coming along with SDK taken into use.

Possible flaw in EGLConfig choosing fixed which could've caused
unnecessary crash under certain situations.
Minor change in background gradient calculation.
